_field_block_64.name: classes

item.Name: only when zoomed#if target is zoomed
sound effect only applied when scale is full

_field_block_64._field_explanation: WARNING 'motion sensor ping' section no longer functions post CHUD-2-CUI switchover!

_field_tag_reference_64.name: rumble descope#if not specified, it will fallback to rumble
camera shake zoomed{camera shake data} #falls back on camerashake if untuned
camera shake descope#if not specified, it will fallback to zoomed
flinch impulse ads#if not specified, it will fallback to non-ads
flinch impulse descope#if not specified, it will fall back to ads
simulated_input zoomed #falls back on simulated input if untuned
simulated_input descope #if not specified, fallsback to zoomed

_field_block_64.name: area control
_field_block_64._field_explanation: Higher level scale controls for camera shake, camera impulse and rumble.

item.Name: use unit position#use the head position and facing vector of the unit instead of the player camera

_field_block_64._field_explanation: controls the maximum distance and the distance falloff of this effect NOTE: not used for scenario global effects

_field_real.name: maximum distance:world units#the maximum distance this player feedback will affect

_field_block_64._field_explanation: controls the falloff of this effect based on how close you are to looking directly at it NOTE: not used for scenario global effects
applies a falloff based on an object function - ignored if the effect is not attached to an object
